telemetry-topic.description: The MQTT topic pattern for the Telemetry.

model-id.description: The identifier of the the service model, which is the full DTMI of the Interface.

data-schema.description: The data schema to use in a cloud event when associated with the telemetry.

topic-namespace.description: A leading namespace for the Telemetry MQTT topic patterns.

custom-token-map.description: A map from custom topic tokens to replacement values.
